thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Epic Offshore Specialty Agreed To Acquire The Offshore Services Division Of Tetra Technologies Inc.

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Epic Offshore Specialty Agreed To Acquire The Offshore Services Division Of Tetra Technologies Inc.

organizations.name: epic offshore specialty agreed to acquire the offshore services division of tetra technologies inc

text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Tetra Technologies Inc:
* EPIC OFFSHORE SPECIALTY, LLC HAS AGREED TO ACQUIRE THE OFFSHORE SERVICES DIVISION OF TETRA TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
* EPIC OFFSHORE SPECIALTY - ‍AT CLOSE OF DEAL, EPIC WILL BECOME INDEPENDENT CO BACKED BY A $1.0 BILLION PRIVATE CO​ Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
